places_with_reviews.name: SMJ GRAND HOTEL & MAHAL
address: 107, 3B2, Grand Southern Trunk Rd, Acharapakkam, Tamil Nadu 603301, India

reviews.text:
Hotel rooms and surrounding area was clean to a sparkle.
Reception received was very pleased and always speaking with a smiling and dinner support was very pleased and satisfied.
Wish you all the best to continue the way it is serviced now.
Totally is was a nice stay for me.
Once again thanks for the courtesy extended during my stay.
Rooms all so good front office reception wist good and food service good🥰
The rooms was so neat. The staff were so polite. A special mention to Akash adhi kesavan, he is so polite and his work is so neat and clean. He is so friendly and genuine in his work.

Not worth staying for the amount paid. Bathroom was not clean when we occupy the room. All the bathroom fittings are rusty. Water stagnate at bathroom and not draining fast. Hard water and therefore not feeling well after bath. They need to purify the water and supply to the bathroom. Drinking water and glasses are not provided. Very poor bathroom light. Promised to provide free breakfast and delayed it without proper reason. Room boy/ helper not available. At ground floor, the visitors are not guided and hence, they knock every room to find out their contact person which is causing abnormal disturbance to our privacy.
Won't prefer to choose it again  for staying .

Good ambience...
It is good to have 300 pax at a time in the hall & 100 pax in dining.
Neatly maintained rest rooms.
Air ventilation is sufficient for this much big hall, that need to be improved

reviews.text: D worst room and services, that I have ever stayed in my life journey. They charge you more, it's partnership is with Oyo. Don't go cheated form seeing hotel from outside, inside the rooms are too badly maintained.

reviews.text: I had booked it through Agoda App. But When I reached there the manager denied the stay and said that the hotel doesnt have any collaboration with Agoda. But If you book through agoda then the money will be rest with the fraudsters.

Good and very clean n tidy rooms , And even the price is also not high , for a night it's just Re 800 , 24*7 geyser I'd there for hot water, along with drinking water facility.. one can stay here for a long time without any worries.
